lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, an Associated Press report in the winter sports roundup in some editions last Sunday about Ted Ligety’s victory in a World Cup giant slalom ski race in Slovenia misstated the number of men’s giant slalom races completed so far this season. It is 7, not 29.
